name: Metronymic
description: Derived from the name of a mother or another female ancestor.

name: Feijoada
description: A dish of rice and black beans baked with various kinds of meat and sausage.

name: Coronach
description: A song of lamentation for the dead; dirge.

name: Barchan
description: A crescent-shaped sand dune with the convex side in the direction of the wind.

name: Guillemet
description: One of two marks « or » used in French, Italian, and Russian printing to enclose quotations.

name: Jovial
description: Endowed with or characterized by a hearty, joyous humor or a spirit of good-fellowship.

name: Descry
description: To see (something unclear or distant) by looking carefully; discern; espy.
